description: An irregular romanization of the Cantonese pronunciation saam¹ siu¹ of 三燒／三烧 (sānshāo, “thrice-burnt”), a former name of 三蒸酒 (sānzhēngjiǔ, “thrice-distilled alcohol”).

entries.meaning: A triple-distilled variety of rice-based baijiu.
(inexact, obsolete or historical) Synonym of baijiu.
